text:
Oe         happy birthday.
Sasti emotional baato ki jaga tasty cheeje hogi yaha jse, moonfills, hall 10 daal, wazwan rajma, appy, pineapple pastry, cc canteen ka breakfast, whooper. Aur kuch bakchodh si movies, unse bhi upar vaha tk jaane ka safar Ujda chaman vala to epic tha. Par 4th year ke kuch plans adhure hai abhi bhi, to unka dekhege kabhi. 
This guys fukks.
author: Sparsh  Kaoshik

text: Aur bajaj bhaiya kaise ho, first year se hi pata tha ki terko hi banana hai room mate to. Ek dum mast chill banda. Ek praani ne koshish ki thi ki naa bane. Maje aaye yr saath me, fest me kaam, hall 10 jaana, ground jaana, ncl cc me jaga rokna, canteen me match dekhna, tere ghar jaake, placement me tera rona, aur vo to hai hi all time tuje chidhane me.  Ok to maine likh diya ab tu bhi likh dio
author: Sparsh  Kaoshik

text:
Hi Monn,
Thanks for making my summer stay at campus happy.
A friend like you is a gift, rather an exceptional gift. You are always ready to help me, thanks for that.
Art padhane ke liye bhi shukriya.
Sorry uss kaand ke liye.
Par kuch bhi kaho, summer me naye dost banake maje aaye.
Bas nanital reh gaya!! 

Yr mai kaisi cheeje likhta hu, baad me khud nhi padhi jaati h. 
Par hai to sach hi. 
 Mera hanky sambhala hua hai na, mai vaapis lunga :)
author: Sparsh  Kaoshik

text: Hi shunal karma from hall 3, originally from kotha(rajasthan). Muje to yaad hi nhi ki terse kab kaise baat cheet shuru hui thi (maybe ache dosto me aisa hi hota hai yaad nhi hona chahiye), shayad badminton ya fir class kyuki aur kahi to tu jaata nhi tha. Shareef bacha hai yr tu. Saari cheeje ek taraf, aur rm me lift ke saamne vale sofe pe stand up ka maja ek taraf, kya alag level hass raha tha tu. Ok to aur kuch likhna senti krne vali baat hojegi, isliye bas.
author: Sparsh  Kaoshik

text: Hello bhai, tu to merko bas aise hi chalte firte milta tha. EK baar ccd me mila tha yaad hai, steve jobs vali book ke baare me batara tha. Maje maarna bhai aur milte hai kbhi!!
author: Sparsh  Kaoshik
